amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated or expended to train the Afghan National Security Forces Special Mission Wing to operate or maintain Mi-17 helicopters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 333 - 93 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 333 - 93 (Roll no. 395).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
